entry.title: The Keyword
entry.summary: Get the latest news and stories about Google products, technology and innovation on the Keyword, Google's official blog.

entry.title: Android
entry.summary: Read the latest news and updates about Android, the world's most popular mobile platform.

entry.title: Google Chrome
entry.summary: Read the latest news and updates about Chrome, Google's fast, free web browser for your computer, phone, and tablet.

entry.title: Chromebook
entry.summary: Read the latest news and updates about Chromebooks, the fast and easy to use laptop that helps you enjoy your favorite apps.

entry.title: Google Play
entry.summary: Read the latest news and updates about Google Play, where you can enjoy your favorite music, movies, books and apps on your Android device, or on the web.

entry.title: Wear OS
entry.summary: Read the latest about Wear OS by Google — smartwatches that let you track fitness, read messages and get help from Google Assistant.

entry.title: Latest News from Google Research Blog - Google Research
entry.summary: We strive to create an environment conducive to many different types of research across many different time scales and levels of risk.
